price: (Rabbiin) ni jedhe: “Nuti dhugumatti, ummata kee siboodaa (bakka ati hin jirretti) mokkorree jirra; Saamiriyyichis isaan jallise.”
arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min baʿdika wa-aḍallahumu al-sāmiriyu
